Growth Tactic: Multi-format content creation from single podcast source (Channel: content)

Strategy: Podcast-first content strategy to build all other media formats

startup_ideas.title: Audience in a Box - service helping creators expand across platforms
startup_ideas.target_market: Successful creators on any single platform (YouTube, podcast, etc.)
startup_ideas.problem_solved: Creators being big on one platform but not expanding to others due to time/expertise constraints
startup_ideas.business_model: Revenue sharing (50/50 split mentioned) or co-ownership of media properties
startup_ideas.validation: Approach creators successful on one platform and offer expansion services

market_gaps.title: Difficulty building mainstream podcasts from scratch
market_gaps.solution_approach: Focus on niche business verticals instead of trying to compete with mainstream shows

trend_opportunities.title: Rise of B2B creators - specialized creators for every business vertical and posi
trend_opportunities.opportunity: Create 'the next Lenny' for every business function and sector

supporting_comments: Love how open Erik is with his strategy
